sen.j: 片岡 松之助（かたおか まつのすけ）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: Matsunosuke KATAOKA is a myoseki (professional name) of kabuki actor.
Matsunosuke KATAOKA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor.
Matsunosuke KATAOKA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor.
Its yago (stage family name) is Midoriya.
The stage family name is Midoriya.
The stage family name is Midoriya.
Current Matsunosuke KATAOKA is the fourth.

He is a son of Ryogoro ONOE.
He is a son of Ryogoro ONOE.
He is a son of Ryogoro ONOE.

sen.j: 片岡仁左衛門 (13代目)に入門。
sen.e: He became a disciple of Nizaemon KATAOKA (the 13th).
He became a disciple of Nizaemon KATAOKA (the 13th).
